name: Chess 2 (itch) (studiokaboom)
description:
Chess 2 introduces the rules of it's age old ancestor to the modern game genre  Real-Time Strategy. Finally, the gaming community has waited since the dawn of time to continue the riveting adventure that is Chess. 

Experience the laws of Chess in an open undiscovered environment. The fog of war shrouds your enemies in darkness. Utilise the barracks of familiar faces as you explore the battlefield. Train new pieces on the go as you gain blood money to grow your army and dominate the board.
